channel.title: Microblogs on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Microblogs on Preslav Rachev

item.description: I caught myself using my old Android phone more and more these days. A 5-year-old Nexus 5, that is. I dug it out a few weeks ago. After the fresh reset all the service updates, it works as if it hasn‚Äôt been two years since I last used it for real. Trinkering with Android like in the good old days felt exciting. In comparison, my experience with iOS has always been like living a comfortable, but relatively boring life.

Ask the reader: This is a question for the avid podcast listeners among you. It will help me take a few decisions for a side project of mine. Your answers are completely anonymous. Good morning from Augsburg, Germany üëãüèº Not many people around (expected for the second day of Easter), but we got a beatufil sunshine and a great view.
A view to live for! üòç Sendlinger Tor | Munich
